title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score People Experiences: Group level aggregates for Communication, Mobility, Content Collaboration, & Meetings
description: ,We are adding group level aggregates to Adoption Score people experiences across Communication, Content Collaboration, Meetings, and Mobility. Group information can be viewed across five Azure Active Directory attributes- Company, Department, Country, State and City. For group level aggregate information to be displayed, the capability must be enabled by a Global Administrator and a minimum of 10 users must be included in a group to ensure that individual users cannot be tracked.
